name: Cute & Shoot
description:
Jump, wallrun, and shoot your way around levels in this platforming FPS. This was made for the second E1M1 game jam and is a little rough around the edges. I went for a cute theme with the environment because it was simple and it's not the typical backdrop for a shooter. 

The inspiration for the environment came from classic cartoony platformers and Lovely Planet.

Uploaded a new version just to fix some bugs I found with certain bullets and triggers. Otherwise the game is identical to the first build.
